participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is resilient and expressive, often using dance as a form of self-expression and freedom.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a. i was born in somalia.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is playful and curious, enjoying simple pleasures like candy and singing.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. i'm four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters.
